FuncDef: The display abs-pfc command displays the statistics on PFC frames for antilocking PFC. The display abs-pfc command displays the statistics on PFC frames for antilocking PFC. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6885-SAN and CE8850-SAN.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
